title: Microsoft Stream: Timeline markers in Teams meeting recordings for when you left or joined meetings
description:
We are adding markers (which appear as icons
above the video timeline) in Teams meeting recording timelines to indicate when
you joined or left a meeting. The markers are personalized, so that only you
will see your join and leave marker. The markers help you jump right to part of
a meeting that you may have missed. Markers will only show up on recordings of
Teams meeting that you were invited to and that you joined. This feature is
only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft Teams Premium
add-on offering.
